title.full: Jimmie Johnsons Anything With An Engine Demo

description.full: Kart Racing Where Everything and Anything Goes…Fast!  Lead-footed bathers, dumpster divers, lawn-mowers, bargain shoppers, sadistic caddies and many more race and battle their way toward glory in unique vehicles outfitted with custom weapon mods on uniquely stylized tracks strewn with themed hazards, traps and awesome jumps in a humor-packed race to the finish line. Up to 4 player split-screen and 8 player online multi-player. 3D TV Support.
description.short: Kart Racing Where Everything and Anything Goes…Fast!  Race unique vehicles outfitted with custom weapon mods on stylized tracks strewn with themed hazards, traps and awesome jumps in a humor-packed race to the finish line. Up to 4 player split-screen and 8 player online multi-player. 3D TV Support.
